# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, it's worth more than $150 to us. Considering its value and the benefits it offers, we're extending this exclusive opportunity to you at an offer price of $120. This is a fantastic deal considering its market value and what it can do for you. Don't miss out on this chance to own a product that will undoubtedly exceed your expectations. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer
